I’m Will Clarkson, a Ph.D. Candidate in Computer Science at Princeton University. I’m a member of the Security Group and the Center for Information Technology Policy. My advisor is Ed Felten. My (professional) interests range from applied cryptography and biometrics to privacy and information technology policy more generally.

Interests

I’m a 3rd year graduate student at Princeton University Computer Science Department
